item.title: Welcome
item.description: This is the course website for “Everyday Ethics and Quotidian Quandries for Computer Scientists”, a new University of Virginia course on ethics targeted to undergraduate computer science students that will be offered for the first time in Spring 2021. Scheduled course meetings are Tuesdays and Thursdays, 9:30am â€“ 10:45am, starting on 2 February 2021. Below, you can read a preliminary description of the course and about the reason for offering it.
